channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1462; 08:15PM; 10320 N Oakdale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mn98xy; #Chatsworth; An outside fire partially damaged a two-story home. Firefighters arrived to quickly extinguish the structure and outside fires, protecting the interior of the home. Firefighters are setting up ventilation measures to clear some light smoke that made its way inside. Ultimately, it took 18 firefighters 15 minutes to respond and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E287 E296 E73 RA96 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1462; 08:15PM; 10320 N Oakdale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mn98xy; #Chatsworth; Two-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E287 E296 E73 RA96 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1051; 03:19PM; 4329 W Los Feliz Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZWrxnP; #LosFeliz; Two-vehicle traffic collision with seven people involved. Six patients had only minor injuries (or none) and did not require hospital transport. One patient was trapped. Firefighters extricated the patient and transported them in moderate condition. Unknown age/gender/circumstances.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E250 E35 E82 EM11 HR3 RA56 RA82 RA835 T35 T50 UR88; CH7; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0461; 09:04AM; 701 N Tigertail Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KmlKCw; #Brentwood; Firefighters rescued one man, the driver who was trapped, from a traffic collision between a dump truck and multiple parked passenger vehicles, which also took out a series of power poles. The adult male driver was transported to a local hospital in serious condition. There may be extended power outages in the area. Motorists, seek alternate routes. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E37 E69 EM9 HR3 RA19 RA71 T37 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1469; 09:07AM; 1539 W Cambria St; #Westlake; LAFD Arson Investigators arrested a 38-year-old male on PC 451(b) for starting a tree fire last night that spread to an inhabited structure at 1539 W Cambria St in Westlake. However, it was unrelated to the recent spree of 26 tree fires, which remains under active investigation.; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1743; 12:33AM; 2857 E 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ujl3yn; Boyle Heights; It took 32 firefighters 34 minutes to extinguish the flames in the vacant one-story commercial building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E12 E17 E2 E202 E209 E210 E25 EM1 RA17 RA25 T10 T2 T9; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1743; 11:59PM; 2857 E 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ujl3yn; #BoyleHeights; One-story vacant commercial (site of previous burn) with fire showing. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E209 E210 E25 EM1 RA17 RA25 T10 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 04/06/2023 INC#1469

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1469; 09:03PM; 1539 W Cambria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZU0wBr; #Westlake; An outside tree fire spread to a pair of nearby two-story residential buildings (fourplexes). Fire fully consumed the attic, with partial involvement of the second (top) floor, where firefighters prevented it from burning down into any first floor units. It took 74 firefighters 45 minutes to extinguish the flames. Approximately 27 people will be displaced. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under active investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E15 E20 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E221 E229 E3 E35 E6 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 PH1 RA11 RA803 RA809 RA811 RA9 RA900 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T21 T29 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1469; 08:18PM; 1539 W Cambria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZU0wBr; #Westlake; A tree fire extended into a multi-family residential structure (two-story fourplex?). There is now heavy fire in the attic. Two additional task forces requested. Offensive mode. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E15 E20 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E3 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA803 RA811 RA900 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1235; 05:29PM; 4815 S Roma Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZSTYmY; #Venice; It took 26 firefighters 24 minutes to extinguish a fire, which was contained mostly to the attic of a 4,601 sq-ft, three-story (portions had a 4th story) home in the "Silver Strand" tract, built in 1985. Firefighters took care to protect belongings below before applying water to the flames above. There were no injuries, and the cause is under investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E62 E63 E67 RA62 T5 T63; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
